title: following order with respect to which, pursuant to section 5(3) of that Act, a
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Regulation of Providers of Building 
Works and Miscellaneous Provisions Act 2022 (Appointment of Registration 
Body) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited regulation provider building work miscellaneous provision act 2022 (appointment registration body) order 2023

title: following order with respect to which, pursuant to section 5(3) of that Act, a
heading: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 19 January 2023.
text_raw: 2. This Order shall come into operation on 19 January 2023.

title: following order with respect to which, pursuant to section 5(3) of that Act, a
heading: 3. The Construction Industry Federation is appointed to be the registration
text_raw:
3. The Construction Industry Federation is appointed to be the registration 
body to perform the functions conferred on the registration body by or under 
the Regulation of Providers of Building Works and Miscellaneous Provisions 
Act 2022 (No. 15 of 2022). 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

18 January, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 24th January, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [8] 3 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
